quote: The real question isn't, will I be able to afford this? The real question is, who do you need to become to afford this house?
why_clipworthy: Challenges listeners to rethink their approach to goal setting.
suggested_hook: Are you asking the right questions about your success?

quote: The questions you ask shape your focus, your emotions, your decisions, and ultimately your results.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of asking the right questions for personal growth.
suggested_hook: Could changing your questions change your life?
